faq.q1.question: Who will do the work at my place?
faq.q1.answer: Myself, Mr. Chappuis. I am your sole contact, from making the appointment to carrying out the work. This ensures consistent work, no subcontracting, and total responsibility for the result.
faq.q2.question: Are quotes free?
faq.q2.answer: Yes, totally. I travel for free to evaluate your renovation or installation projects. It's an opportunity to advise you on the best equipment. Only complex leak searches with specific equipment may be subject to a diagnostic fee (announced in advance).
faq.q3.question: What is your intervention area?
faq.q3.answer: I remain faithful to my region: La Côte. I operate from Versoix to Morges, via Nyon, Gland, Rolle (my headquarters), Aubonne and the Jura foothills. This geographical proximity is the key to my responsiveness and punctuality.
faq.q4.question: What brands do you install?
faq.q4.answer: I prioritize lasting quality. I work mainly with Swiss and leading brands like Geberit, KWC, Laufen, or internationals like Villeroy & Boch. I refuse 'low-cost' material that does not last over time. Your peace of mind is my priority.
faq.q5.question: Do you work with property management companies?
faq.q5.answer: Yes, I am the trusted partner of several real estate agencies in the region. I am used to managing the maintenance of real estate parks, with the necessary tact to intervene with tenants.
